abstract: Third Point’s founder, Daniel S. Loeb, has again picked up his pen to criticize the White House’s leadership in the hedge fund’s latest letter to investors.
snippet: Third Point’s founder, Daniel S. Loeb, has again picked up his pen to criticize the White House’s leadership in the hedge fund’s latest letter to investors.
lead_paragraph: Daniel S. Loeb, the founder of Third Point, isn’t shy about speaking his mind.

headline.main: Writing Again, Third Point’s Loeb Takes Swipe at Obama
